clueGame

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • clueGame.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Board
extends javax.swing.JPanel

    Board

    This is the primary class that establishes the board and the data contained therein.
    Since:
    2017-10-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adam Nelson, Nathaniel Fuller, Youjun Lee
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This sets up the board by calling functions to load the corresponding configuration files and then calculate the adjacency sets for each cell.

      • loadRoomConfig

        public void loadRoomConfig()
                    throws BadConfigFormatException
        This loads the legend for the different room types. Throws an exception if the file is not properly formatted or if the file cannot be found.
        Throws:
        BadConfigFormatException - Throws various formatting exceptions

      • loadBoardConfig

        public void loadBoardConfig()
                     throws BadConfigFormatException
        This loads the data of the board, and throws an exception if the data is not formatted properly or if the file cannot be found.
        Throws:
        BadConfigFormatException - Throws various formatting exceptions

      • calcAdjacencies

        public void calcAdjacencies()
        This method creates a set for each cell that contains the cells it is adjacent to.

      • calcTargets

        public void calcTargets(int cellX,
                        int cellY,
                        int pathLength)
        This determines possible new destinations for a given path length from the previous cell.
        Parameters:
        cellX - Location of the cell on the x-axis.
        cellY - Location of the cell on the y-axis.
        pathLength - The number of unique cells that can be traveled.

      • loadConfigFiles

        public void loadConfigFiles()
        Loads the Players, and Weapons configuration files.

      • convertColor

        public java.awt.Color convertColor(java.lang.String strColor)
        Used to convert a string from config file to a color object
        Parameters:
        strColor - The string of the desired color
        Returns:
        Color The color object.

      • dealer

        public void dealer()
        Randomly selects a solution of one Room, Weapon, and Person.

      • handleSuggestion

        public Card handleSuggestion(Player player,
                             Solution suggestion)
        Sends a suggestion to each player and checks for possible cards.
        Parameters:
        player - The player making the suggestion.
        suggestion - The player's suggestion.
        Returns:
        Card Returns a card within the suggestion, revealing it to the player who guessed.

      • checkAccusation

        public boolean checkAccusation(Solution accusation)
        Checks an accusation against the set solution to see if the player has correctly guessed and therefore won.
        Parameters:
        accusation - The player's guess.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the player accurately guessed the solution.

        Overrides:
